name: EventClickSlot
description: This event is fired when the user clicks a slot in an inventory interface.
overview:
Fires when a player clicks on any inventory slot.
Different click modes and buttons represent different click actions.
This event is cancellable - preventing the original click action.
The mode and button values follow Minecraft's window click protocol.
Can be used to intercept or modify inventory interactions.

methods.name: getInventory
methods.description: Returns the inventory object associated with this click event. This provides access to the full inventory, allowing you to examine other slots, get item details, or perform additional inventory operations.
examples:
const inventory = e.getInventory();
const slotItem = inventory.getSlot(slot);

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.
